name: vuepress-plugin-typedoc
description: A VuePress plugin to build api documentation with TypeDoc.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run build && npm run test
scripts.test:init: rm -rf test/site && yarn create vuepress-site test/site
scripts.test:demo:start: rm -rf ./test/site/docs/api && yarn run build && cd test/site/docs && npm run dev
scripts.test:demo:build: yarn run build && cd demo && yarn run build && npx http-server docs/.vuepress/dist -o
scripts.build-and-test: npm run build && npm run test

author: Thomas Grey
